column4: I thought you said it segfaulted?
I guess you've tried a minimal apt-sources and apt-get update?
narco what version of ubuntu you usu
so. anyone know how I can achive this
best to just repeat your question since most people have no idea what "this" is
after you apt-get source, apply the patch, then rebuild
take a quick look at 'man patch'.  It's very readable.  poke me if you're stuck
the package already has a diff? can I just diff the source and do apt-get -b ? or do I have to do other things
what do you mean by "the package already has a diff"?
you need to go inside the directory you got and apply patch
you need to diff the right versions
